sqlitedatabases

Class SQLiteDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • sqlitedatabases.SQLiteDatabase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilmsDatabase, ReservationsDatabase, ScreeningsDatabase, UsersDatabase

    public abstract class SQLiteDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class and parent class of all SQLite database classes. Contains methods for connecting with the database, and querying the database. Also contains abstract methods which must be implemented by all of its sub-class databases.

      overloaded displayColumns method ResultSet returned as all rows corresponding to column names given
      java.sql.ResultSet displayColumns(java.lang.String column1, java.lang.String column2, java.lang.String column3)
      overloaded displayColumns method ResultSet returned as all rows corresponding to column names given
      java.sql.ResultSet queryForProfile(int userID)
      Query for films, screenings and reservations tables where 'userID' is the same as the userID and given as an argument.
      java.sql.ResultSet queryForProfile(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String date, int userID)
      Query for films, screenings and reservations tables where 'userID' and 'date' are the same as the userID and date given as arguments.
